New Records: Rohit Sharma broke the record for the fastest World Cup century, from 72 balls, surpassing Kapil Dev's record by nine deliveries
Rohit Sharma reached a seventh World Cup century in 19 innings to surpass Sachin Tendulkar, whose six tons were registered in 44 innings
Key Match Events: India chased down 273 runs in 35 overs to win by 8 wickets
Virat Kohli scored a 50 in front of his home crowd
KL Rahul and Kohli put on a masterclass to recover their match against Australia
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized that India mustn't worry about external factors ahead of their match against Pakistan
Post-Match Reflections: Hashmatullah Shahidi said there are no regrets about batting first despite falling a long way short of a competitive score
Rohit Sharma didn't want to be drawn on the records that fell in his incredible knock
Miscellaneous Highlights: India recorded a record-breaking win against Afghanistan in the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023
Afghanistan captain Hashmatullah Shahidi said they had a target above 300 in mind in these conditions
Rohit Sharma was named the Player of the Match
